CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Verdant Ventures}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total turnover rate?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Skyward Systems}.

VE.Q: What is Verdant Ventures's Turnover Rate in 1991?
VE.A: Verdant Ventures's turnover rate in 1991 is {28.48} %.

VE.Q: What is Skyward Systems's Turnover Rate in 1989?
VE.A: Skyward Systems's turnover rate in 1989 is {0.15} %.

VE.Q: What is Skyward Systems's Turnover Rate in 1992?
VE.A: Skyward Systems's turnover rate in 1992 is {1.21} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Turnover Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total turnover rate is {25.93} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Turnover Rate in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total turnover rate is {36.80} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Skyward Systems's Turnover Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Skyward Systems's turnover rate area is {4.59} %.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Verdant Ventures's Turnover Rate area?
SC.A: The average height of Verdant Ventures's turnover rate area is {25.92} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Turnover Rate fall between 29 and 32 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {28.84} % in {1985}, total value was {31.06} % in {1977}, total value was {30.61} % in {1992}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Turnover Rate exceed 32 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {33.47} % in {1993}, total value was {36.01} % in {1996}, total value was {32.42} % in {1988}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Turnover Rate go below 28 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {25.96} % in {1986}, total value was {27.58} % in {1984}, total value was {25.93} % in {1980}.

NC.Q: Between 1984 and 1999, did the total Turnover Rate experience a larger or smaller change than between 1974 and 1989?
NC.A: The change in total turnover rate between {1984} and {1999} was {larger} than between {1974} and {1989}.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1980, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1980 and 1987?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between {1975} and {1980} was {higher} than between {1980} and {1987}.

NC.Q: Was the total Turnover Rate in 1982 higher or lower than in 2001?
NC.A: The total turnover rate in {1982} was {lower} than in {2001}.

NC.Q: Between 1985 and 1997, was the average total Turnover Rate higher or lower than between 1973 and 1991?
NC.A: The average total turnover rate between {1985} and {1997} was {higher} than between {1973} and {1991}.
